translations.translation: it truly is one of the greatest of all things,
That (Hell) is surely one of the greater (signs),
surely (Hell) is one of the greatest Signs,
hell is certainly the greatest calamity.
Indeed hell is one of the greatest entities.
Verily, it is but one of the greatest (signs).
Surely it (hell) is one of the gravest (misfortunes),
surely it is one of the greatest things
Lo! this is one of the greatest (portents)
Surely, it is one of the gravest things,
Verily it is one of the greatest woes.
Indeed they are one of the greatest [signs of God]
This is but one of the mighty (portents),
Verily, it (Hell, or their denial of the Prophet Muhammad SAW, or the Day of Resurrection) is but one of the greatest calamities.
it is one of the greatest trials,
It is one of the greatest.
Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
[74:35] Verily it, that is, Saqar, is one of the enormities, [one of] the greatest calamities —
Lo! this is) i.e. Saqar (one of the greatest (portents)) this is one of the gates of the Fire; other gates include: Jahannam, Laza, al-Hutamah, al-Sa'ir, al-Jahim, and al-Hawiyah.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّهَا لإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ } معناه النَّارُ

translations.translation: And His saying - {Indeed, it is one of the great [fires].} Its meaning is the Fire.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنَّهَا } أي: سقر الطرد والحرمان، وسعير الزجر والخذلان، والخزنة المعدودين الموكلين عليها بقدرة الله { لإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ } [المدثر: 35] أي: إحدى البلايا والمصيبات الكبار النازلة لأصحاب الضلال بمقتضى القهر الإلهي وجلاله
